attributes.action: save taxpayers money by scraping quango's and unelected buearucrats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the 22bln a year wasted on quango's could be used to build hospitals then you could get rid of p.f.i. cost to
taxpayer every £1 borrowed we pay back £7 just another rip of. once upon a time we had councils and a parliament

now out of control.
